column1: What he lacks in fingers, I make up for in tits. Make us regret this.
Wannabe pro smash brothers player, tryna get swole.
16 failed his driving test, twin passed, has nothing to live for, roast the shit out of him
I a 20 year old dude who lives at home and attends community college... never been happier!
12 hour car ride ahead of me... Make me cry.

I'm an attention whore. I majored in bio for a whole year and hated it so switched to English. I am alone in life and desperately want a boyfriend but still don't have one. And yes. I know I have a Pinnochio nose! Anything else I should know?


[deleted]
I bet you can't even toast me
